Name: amstrategies
Description: number of operator strategies for this access method

Name: amsupport
Description: number of support routines for this access method

Name: amorderstrategy
Description: zero if the index offers no sort order, otherwise the strategy number of the strategy operator that describes the sort order

Name: amcanunique
Description: does the access method support unique indexes?

Name: amcanmulticol
Description: does the access method support multicolumn indexes?

Name: amoptionalkey
Description: does the access method support a scan without any constraint for the first index column?

Name: amindexnulls
Description: does the access method support null index entries?

Name: amconcurrent
Description: does the access method support concurrent updates?

Name: amcostestimate
Description: function to estimate cost of an index scan
